channel.title: How to Find the Animation file/frameorder you want!

item.title: How to Find the Animation file/frameorder you want!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Stop leeching other peoples work, this is just bloodisles frame dump and my method for converting his piss poor dump. He’s got a better dump you don’t have.

  1. If you had a fucking clue you’d dump the frame ID and file ID seperately yourself instead of leeching others work.

  2. The frame ID that is dumped in this way is NOT always the same as the one in the file. You want proof?, try converting the GS emotes yourself, i guarentee you’ll fail.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Find the Animation file/frameorder you want!

item.title: How to Find the Animation file/frameorder you want!
item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

Ok alot of ppl have problems with getting the right Animation file.

This Information thread will teach you how to find Player Emotes, Graphics, Objects animations

Step one Download the Framedump:http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=166443

Now For example:Quest Skillcapes

GFX ID:816 Model = 19086 Animation = 4946

Then we open the file 4946

you will see:

[QUOTE]animation.animationFrame[0] = 112590872;
animation.animationFrame[1] = 112590925;
animation.animationFrame[2] = 112590978;
animation.animationFrame[3] = 112590944;
animation.animationFrame[4] = 112590963;
animation.animationFrame[5] = 112590969;
animation.animationFrame[6] = 112590921;
animation.animationFrame[7] = 112590912;
animation.animationFrame[8] = 112590957;
animation.animationFrame[9] = 112590939;
animation.animationFrame[10] = 112590950;
animation.animationFrame[11] = 112590936;
animation.animationFrame[12] = 112590887;
animation.animationFrame[13] = 112590853;
animation.animationFrame[14] = 112590988;
animation.animationFrame[15] = 112590986;
animation.animationFrame[16] = 112590872;
animation.animationFrame[17] = 112590925;
animation.animationFrame[18] = 112590978;
animation.animationFrame[19] = 112590944;
animation.animationFrame[20] = 112590963;
animation.animationFrame[21] = 112590969;
animation.animationFrame[22] = 112590921;
animation.animationFrame[23] = 112590912;
animation.animationFrame[24] = 112590957;
animation.animationFrame[25] = 112590939;
animation.animationFrame[26] = 112590950;
animation.animationFrame[27] = 112590936;
animation.animationFrame[28] = 112590887;
animation.animationFrame[29] = 112590853;
animation.animationFrame[30] = 112590988;
animation.animationFrame[31] = 112590986;
animation.animationFrame[32] = 112590872;
animation.animationFrame[33] = 112590925;
animation.animationFrame[34] = 112590978;
animation.animationFrame[35] = 112590944;
animation.animationFrame[36] = 112590963;
animation.animationFrame[37] = 112590969;
animation.animationFrame[38] = 112590921;
animation.animationFrame[39] = 112590912;
animation.animationFrame[40] = 112590957;
animation.animationFrame[41] = 112590939;
animation.animationFrame[42] = 112590950;
animation.animationFrame[43] = 112590936;
animation.animationFrame[44] = 112590887;
animation.animationFrame[45] = 112590853;
animation.animationFrame[46] = 112590988;
animation.animationFrame[47] = 112590986;
animation.animationFrame[48] = 112590872;
animation.animationFrame[49] = 112590925;
animation.animationFrame[50] = 112590978;
animation.animationFrame[51] = 112590944;
animation.animationFrame[52] = 112590963;
animation.animationFrame[53] = 112590969;
animation.animationFrame[54] = 112590921;
animation.animationFrame[55] = 112590912;
animation.animationFrame[56] = 112590957;
animation.animationFrame[57] = 112590939;
animation.animationFrame[58] = 112590950;
animation.animationFrame[59] = 112590936;
animation.animationFrame[60] = 112590887;
animation.animationFrame[61] = 112590853;
animation.animationFrame[62] = 112590988;
animation.animationFrame[63] = 112590986;[/quote]

Now go to this site: http://www.statman.info/conversions/hexadecimal.html

Enter in 112590872
press to Heximal(6b60018)
enter in 06b6
Press to Decimal
Animation File :1718

Enter in 0018
Press to Decimal
Animation frame:24

Total out come
112590872
06b6 0018
1718 24

Now Do 112590872 - 24 = 112590872

that means you can do everything of this list - 112590872 to get the 100% order

Thats it so simple is that. Ask any questions

Read full topic
